entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
